detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract ZAO (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZAO.sol#84-201) has payable functions:
	 - ZAO.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZAO.sol#190-192)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [ZAO](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZAO.sol#L84-L201) has payable functions:
	 - [ZAO.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZAO.sol#L190-L192)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
